name: Maze64
description:
Gameplay

Find the 3 keys then go though the gate at the top of the maze.

Controls

Difficulty selection: Up and down arrows or W and S to select, space bar or enter to start the game

Movement: WASD

Shoot: Space bar

Toggle background music on/off: M

Credits for sounds: https://github.com/danielabbott/Maze64/blob/master/CREDITS.txt
